column4: Does anyone know if I can install ubuntu 10.04 and boot OS X 10.5 from a CD/Thumb drive?
Does anyone know if I can install ubuntu 10.04 and boot OS X 10.5 from a CD/Thumb drive?
does the osx liscence allow you to install to a usb stick (a little off-topic)
I think I can image it to a CD and boot from that in a worst-case scenario.
